intro.title: Project Management System
intro.desc: Simple, flexible, and powerful. All it takes are boards, lists, and cards to get a clear view of who's doing what and what needs to get done. What are you waiting for. Sign up!

feature1.name: Integrations
feature1.desc: Connect the apps your team already uses into your workflow or add a Power-Up to fine-tune your specific needs.

feature2.name: Enterprise
feature2.desc: The productivity tool teams love, paired with the features and security needed for scale.

feature3.name: Butler Automation
feature3.desc: No-code automation is built into every board. Focus on the work that matters most and let the robots do the rest.

tariff1.name: Free
tariff1.desc: For individuals or teams looking to organize any project.

tariff2.name: Premium
tariff2.desc: For teams that need to track and visualize multiple projects in several ways, including boards, timelines, calendars, etc.

tariff3.name: Enterprise
tariff3.desc: For organizations that need to connect work across teams with more security and controls.

about.title: About Me
about.desc: I am a full-stack web developer and enthusiast to progress within software development. For the last two years, I have been learning web development and building various open-source projects. I'm currently studying at RS School. I love learning new things and sharing my knowledge and discoveries with others through videos (on Youtube) and Blog posts.

course.title: About front-end course
course.desc: The course program consists of 3 stages. There may be requirements for advancing to each higher stage, which will be described below. This specific run of the program will take the form of self-study. This means that you will have access to pre-recorded webinars, recommended materials, and weekly live Q&A sessions with our mentors/coordinators to answer any questions you might have.
